description: Two community leaders must decide whether to organize a large-scale cleanup event or focus on smaller, individual efforts. If both organize the event, they succeed and receive community recognition. If one organizes while the other focuses on individual efforts, the organizer fails while the individual worker gains local support. If both focus on individual efforts, they receive moderate support.

participants.name: You
participants.profile: Community leader with environmental advocacy experience

participants.name: Bob
participants.profile: Community leader with environmental advocacy experience
